data.text: @ThomasConnors You do realize that people of all ages die every day for a wide variety of reasons, and that’s unlikely to change as a large swath of the world’s population receives one of these vaccines?

@estherschmeer @inhisserviceat1 This mRNA technique has never been used at scale before. They have never even manufactured at scale before - for the trials they use small-lot prototype methods. Everything is new and not tested much and rushed and not even needed - now a background circulating virus, no threat. https://t.co/f4P5JdZc0f

@inhisserviceat1 @ThomasConnors We r not talking about vaccines as defined by the CDC as “a product that stimulates a person’s immune system to produce immunity to a specific disease.” This is an experimental and novel technology whose impact on our health, especially long-term, is unknown.
@ThomasConnors @inhisserviceat1 There are many reasons that justify the rejection of these experimental vaccines, the fattening of the already perversely rich being one more.

@estherschmeer @inhisserviceat1 He was fine until he followed the bad advice of his doctor and the media and politicians who depend upon Pharma

He died so other people could make money

@inhisserviceat1 Right - people should not be getting injected. The old people are old and frail and with comorbidities.

The young healthy are not at risk of dying of a flu-like virus - so they should not be injected.

It is all a worldwide fake hoax eugenics program

Destroying rep of medicine
@ThomasConnors Being 86, 99 had nothing to do with it❓
